评论概述: I like these! Size up if you have curves - these aren't necessarily forgiving.
评论详情: If you're curious about the texture of these boxers for women - picture old school, standard boxers for men. These are stiffer and hardier and kinda more like cotton shorts material than something you'd want to wear without undies underneath for comfort. That said, I love the style and simplicity of these, especially when I'm wearing nightshirts or tanks on the shorter side and just need a little more coverage when it's night time/bedtime and I'm around other people in the house or lounging around in the mornings with the possibility of someone seeing me. I would say these run fairly true to size at first blush, BUT they are not very forgiving and that can be problematic for most women. I am around a size 4 and ordered the Small, and they fit just right - but barely, and I have a rather flat bum these days. They're not overly baggy and they're on the short side - and I definitely would not want them any smaller at all. In fact, I'd probably be more comfortable in the Medium - and again, that's at a size 4. These don't necessarily have much stretch and give to them outside of the waistband overall, and that can be an issue for women as we are all shaped differently around the hips/bum area and often need some sort of give to account for curves. While these fit me fine for now, I can completely understand others with different shapes and sizes having a hard time with these due to this lack of stretch/give, and I would say they run on the small side and to size up. I do love the prints on these and they wash and dry easily over and over with no issues whatsoever - so they're pretty hardy and I expect them to last a long time. Depending on what you're looking for, YMMV.
The pajama shorts resemble men's boxers, but they are not bad for hot summer use. I appreciate that they are made of 100% cotton, which is my preferred fabric.

It has an elastic waistband which is nice and helps make them more comfortable. If you have a larger butt though you may wanna size up because there’s zero stretch obviously in the cotton. Maybe I won’t steal my hubbys anymore, but probably will lol. I like how cozy they are for lounging or sleeping in. I’m 5’4 weigh 125 with a 25 in waist and got a size small which fit me nicely. I love the variety of designs as well. My butt does slightly hang out of them. Also being that they’re cotton they may shrink too. I honestly love these!
